question:
To the casual observer, the desert appears ________ place; those who look deeper, however, discover that it supports a vibrant ecosystem teeming with life.
Two Answers
A. a verdant
B. an arid
C. a desolate
D. a desiccated
E. an inhospitable
F. a lush
